pages.text: $(li)The Aloe Leaves is an eatable item that can be obtained by harvesting Aloe Vera plants in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/dunes)Dunes$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/farmer)Farmers$(/l) will exchange you this item by your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/atmospheric/aloe_gel_bottle)Aloe Gel Bottle$(/l) or an $(l)Aloe Bundle$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).
$(li)This item can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/atmospheric/relief)Potion of Relief$(/l).
